metadata.title: CVE-2024-25739 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: create_empty_lvol in drivers/mtd/ubi/vtbl.c in the Linux kernel through6.7.4 can attempt to allocate zero bytes, and crash, because of a missingcheck for ubi->leb_size.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
